extName.description: Quick access to GEO data of images on webpages

extDescription.message: Shows place at Google Maps for images with GEO data.
extDescription.description: Simply right-click on image and choose the menu item “Show map.” The Google maps positioned at the place the image was taken will be shown in new tab.

menuItemCaption.description: Shows the Google Map with this place in new tab.

leaflet_alt.description: Shows the Leaflet Map with markers of places found on that page

leaflet_title.message: Shows the Leaflet Map with markers of places found on that page
leaflet_title.description: Shows the Leaflet Map with markers of places found on that page
